title: The Forest
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: What might you see when you visit a forest? In this book, students will have the opportunity to visit a forest and explore what lives in this setting. High-frequency words, repetitive sentences, and supportive illustrations make this book ideal for early-emergent readers.
reviewWords: deer, forest, fox, mushroom, rabbit, squirrel, stream, tree
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Ff with the /f/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word this
